gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Magic 121, Pelicans 106
gameRecap.excerpt: The Magic defeated the Pelicans, 121-106 tonight. Jalen Suggs led Orlando with 22 points as Paolo Banchero tallied the second triple-double of his career with 20 points, 10 rebounds, and 11 assists. Trey Murphy III led New Orleans with 21 points while Zion Williamson added 20 points and seven rebounds. Orlando wins their fifth straight game and the eighth of their last 10 as they move to 42-28, as the Pelicans have a three-game win streak snapped to fall to 42-27. Orlando has a chance to hold the four seed with a NYK loss tonight.
